summary: Provides ECIES (Elliptic Curve Integrated Encryption Scheme) utilities built on the secp256k1 curve used in Bitcoin, combining asymmetric key agreement with AES symmetric encryption and HMAC integrity checks, and handling encoding/decoding of ciphertext.
